measure.name: set_ptac_inputs
measure.description: Replace this text with an explanation of what the measure does in terms that can be understood by a general building professional audience (building owners, architects, engineers, contractors, etc.). This description will be used to create reports aimed at convincing the owner and/or design team to implement the measure in the actual building design. For this reason, the description may include details about how the measure would be implemented, along with explanations of qualitative benefits associated with the measure. It is good practice to include citations in the measure if the description is taken from a known source or if specific benefits are listed.
measure.modeler_description: Replace this text with an explanation for the energy modeler specifically. It should explain how the measure is modeled, including any requirements about how the baseline model must be set up, major assumptions, citations of references to applicable modeling resources, etc. The energy modeler should be able to read this description and understand what changes the measure is making to the model and why these changes are being made. Because the Modeler Description is written for an expert audience, using common abbreviations for brevity is good practice.

argument.name: string
argument.display_name: Set inputs for equipment containing the string (case sensitive, enter *.* for all):

argument.name: ptac_flow_clg
argument.display_name: PTAC: Supply Air Flow Rate During Cooling Operation {ft3/min}

argument.name: ptac_flow_htg
argument.display_name: PTAC: Supply Air Flow Rate During Heating Operation {ft3/min}

argument.name: ptac_flow_no_clg_or_htg
argument.display_name: PTAC: Supply Air Flow Rate When No Cooling or Heating is Needed {ft3/min}

argument.name: ptac_oa_clg
argument.display_name: PTAC: Outdoor Air Flow Rate During Cooling Operation {ft3/min}

argument.name: ptac_oa_htg
argument.display_name: PTAC: Outdoor Air Flow Rate During Heating Operation {ft3/min}

argument.name: ptac_oa_no_clg_or_htg
argument.display_name: PTAC: Outdoor Air Flow Rate When No Cooling or Heating is Needed {ft3/min}

argument.name: hc_ewt
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Inlet Water Temperature {F}

argument.name: hc_eat
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Inlet Air Temperature {F}

argument.name: hc_lwt
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Outlet Water Temperature {F}

argument.name: hc_lat
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Outlet Air Temperature {F}

argument.name: cc_cap
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Gross Rated Total Cooling Capacity {Btu/h}

argument.name: cc_shr
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Gross Rated Sensible Heat Ratio

argument.name: cc_cop
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Gross Rated Cooling COP {Btuh/Btuh}

argument.name: cc_flow
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Rated Air Flow Rate {ft3/min}
